title: New Tomb Raider Announced - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.05.22
description:
Crystal Dynamics is working on another Tomb Raider, Unreal Engine 5 is out today, and Gary has a pitch for Lake on PS5!

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:10:15 - Housekeeping
We have new merch on kindafunny.com/store. KEVIN, let’s watch the video!  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=suxBLiqa4P8
KFW on youtube.com/kindafunnyplays
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: FargoBrady, Pranksy, & Anonymous
The Roper Report  -
00:16:18 - New Tomb Raider Announced, Matt Kim @ IGN
00:22:24 - Does this at all alter your forecast for the games' long term longevity? - Best Friends Q:Grezick
00:31:16 - Seemed more like companies posting help wanted signs. - Best Friends Q:Robert
00:36:26 - State of Unreal Recap by Giuseppe Nelva @ Twinfinite
00:38:25 - Ad
00:41:08 - When Are You Getting a Steam Deck? Taylor Lyles @ IGN
00:48:33 - AC Invades Fortnite, Eddie Makuch @ GameSpot
00:50:17 - Lost Ark Road Map, Ryan Dinsdale @ IGN
00:50:55 - QUICKIES
00:55:45 - Out today
00:58:00 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Blessing and Janet
